scripts.build-client: cd cli && npm install && ng build && cd ../
scripts.deploy: npm run build-client & npm install && npm run start-server
scripts.deploy_index: npm run build-client & npm install && npm run start-server-index
scripts.deploy_win: npm run elastic & npm run mongo_win & npm run deploy
scripts.deploy_win_index: npm run elastic & npm run mongo_win & npm run deploy_index
scripts.deploy_unix: npm run mongo_unix & npm run deploy
scripts.deploy_unix_index: npm run mongo_unix & npm run deploy_index
